description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Compensation_Basis_ConfigurableObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Compensation_Basis_ConfigurableObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Compensation_Basis_ConfigurableObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Configurable Compensation Basis Reference ID or WID. Required when updating an existing compensation basis.

Configurable_Compensation_Basis_Data.description: Unique attribute identifying a valid instance of a configurable compensation basis.
Inactive status indicator for the configurable compensation basis.
Unique name identifying a valid instance of a configurable compensation basis.

validation.validation: The compensation basis name entered has already been used.

Configurable_Compensation_Basis_Data.description: Description for the valid instance of configurable compensation basis.
Indicator to allow display of configurable compensation basis on the worker's related actions menu.
Ranking used if an employee is eligible for more than 1 compensation basis.

validation.validation: Compensation basis ranking must be unique, select a different integer that is not already in use.
Cannot submit a ranking for compensation basis because it is not assigned to the compensation functional area.
Ranking must be greater than zero.

Configurable_Compensation_Basis_Data.description: Eligibility Rules to establish who is eligible for this configurable compensation basis. If you select multiple eligibility rules, Workday evaluates each rule independently to determine employee eligibility for the compensation basis. Employees are eligible if they meet the qualifications of any one rule.

Configurable_Compensation_Basis_Data.description: Functional area(s) for this configurable compensation basis. Benefits: 08f38eba0e48433a8fd1392dc9855d51, Compensation: e7f8e997756f419f80c963ee9c88dd0c, Planning: 9e48f14fb6a11000062945274d9430fb, or Projects and Work: b6e6f96990064b7995b0e84b01c9a0ba.
If selected, all salary plans will be included in the configurable compensation basis.
If selected, salary plans will be used only towards base pay.

validation.validation: Commission Plans All and Selected by Compensation Basis cannot be used together. Select one or the other.
Future Payment Plans All and Selected by Compensation Basis cannot be used together. Select one or the other.
Retirement Savings Plans All and Selected by Compensation Basis cannot be used together. Select one or the other.
Stock Plans All and Selected by Compensation Basis cannot be used together. Select one or the other.
Bonus Plans All and Selected by Compensation Basis cannot be used together. Select one or the other.
Salary Plans All, Base Pay Only, and Selected by Compensation Basis cannot be used together. Please select one.
Period Salary Plans All, Base Pay Only, and Selected by Compensation Basis cannot be used together. Please select one.
Calculated Plans All, Base Pay Only, and Selected by Compensation Basis cannot be used together. Please select one.
Allowance Plans All, Base Pay Only, and Selected by Compensation Basis cannot be used together. Please select one.
